metadata.name: Keeping Score
metadata.summary: Explore the music and compelling stories of composerswho struggled with musical language as a unique expression of their ideas.
metadata.description: Explore the music and compelling stories of composers including Hector Berlioz, Charles Ives, Dmitri Shostakovich, who each struggled with musical language as a unique expression of their ideas.
metadata.keywords: PBS, Keeping score, Hector Berlioz, Charles Ives, Dmitri Shostakovich, music, composers, classical
